profile:
► Victorious Carpet and Flooring Sales, Installation, Repair, and Carpet Re-Stretching Services ◄
 
▬ Visit us online at → https://www.victoriousflooring.com/
Your Experienced Carpet & Flooring Sales, Installation, Repair & Stretching Services With Satisfaction Guaranteed! 

****

We have solutions for all occasions and budgets! Now select beautiful and less costly carpets from inside your own home or office! Our free Shop-At-Home service lets you choose the right carpet in the comfort of your own place. Make the right choice when viewing samples within your décor and under your lighting conditions. Take advantage of our low-cost overhead now! We'll be happy to assist you in making the right choice for your décor and budget. 
Call us today or e-mail us to book your Shop@Home visit!
 
▬ Things Happen... We Can Help!
We offer a wide range of installation and repair services for common flooring materials across the GTA with no obligation consulting and estimate service. 
 
▬ Top 10 Reasons Why You Should Buy From Us;
1. GTA's Award-Winning Service - Rated Toronto's #1 Carpet Installation Company for the last 14 years in the row 
2. Honest Upfront Pricing - No Hidden Costs. Written Contract, Detailed-Itemized Estimate / Invoicing Provided
3. Computerized Calculation to Optimize Material Usage With Minimum Wastage 
4. Free "Accidental Service Request"
5. Unbeatable Lifetime Labour Warranty 
6. Clear Explanations & Written Pre-Installation Checklist 
7. In-house Installation Service. 
We DON'T Sub-Contract. (Read Competitors & Big Box Stores Fine Print) 
8. Professional / Written Site Inspection 
9. Convenient weekend and evening appointments 
10. Wide Range of Payment Options (Finance, Personal Cheque, Interac E-mail Money Transfer, PayPal, Visa & MasterCard)
 
▬ Buy with confidence! All of our products are DIRECTLY from the manufacturer.
Residential Wall to Wall Carpet Sales, Carpet Installation, Carpet Repairs & Carpet Stretching Services 
A wide range of Berber (Loop), Plush, Patterned, Saxony Carpet Selection.
Now offering inexpensive Basement Carpeting. Full cover Stairs or Runners. Silky soft Bedroom / Living Room Carpeting 
 
▬ We are also specialized in;
• Berber Snag Repairs
• Wrinkled, Bulged & Buckled Carpets (Carpet Stretching Services)
• Irons Burns
• Bleach & Paint Spots
• Pet (Cat, Dog) Damages, and much more!
 
Please feel free to call us at (416) 858-7006 Or visit us at https://www.victoriousflooring.com/
7 days a week for a no-obligation estimate!

For 416-SO-CLEAN COVID-19 - Infectious Disease Preparedness Response Plan, pls see: https://www.416soclean.ca/covid-19-prepare.html 

416-SO-CLEAN is a certified & locally-owned company that specializes in residential and commercial carpet, upholstery & duct cleaning. Established in 2003, 416-SO-CLEAN has amassed a 98% Homestar rating that showcases our exemplary workmanship. We go as far as guaranteeing our work with a 100% satisfaction guarantee with our "Love it or Don't Pay Guarantee". 

We use environmentally-safe cleaning products with state of the art truck-mounted steam cleaning technology for carpet and duct cleaning. We also offer a premium Detox and Platinum cleaning plans to eliminate allergens and pet stains, as well as fabric protection. We are located in North York, however, our trucks service all major cities from Mississauga to Oshawa.

profile:
We Offer Allergy Carpet Cleaning, Green Steam Cleaning, Mattress and Furniture Cleaning.

https://www.allergyreliefcleaning.com. Our minimum charge starts from $150.00, depending upon location. You can combine carpet, furniture, mattress cleaning to meet our minimum charge.
 
Here is how the Allergy Treatment works. A small child continually exposed to dust mite allergens over a long period of time, can be susceptible to asthma later on in life. Besides asthma, rhinitis, and other respiratory ailments, house dust mites can be the cause of other serious health problems such as eczema, rashes, itchy skin or eyes, "glue ear" (a condition which often causes hearing loss), bronchitis, and chronic dermatitis.
 
The house dust mite excrement is one of the most widespread allergen triggers for asthma, eczema and allergic nasal mucous membrane inflammations. This trigger was a microscopic protein found in the excrement of the mite. Those tiny creatures thrive in their millions in the warmth and humidity of carpets, mattresses, bedding, upholstery and furnishings of even the most scrupulously clean homes. They are too small to be seen without a microscope, feeding mainly on shedded human skin scales, fungi and bacteria.
 
Allergy Relief Treatment:  After allergy cleaning your carpets, furniture, and mattresses, the Allergy Relief Treatment is applied, containing powerful, yet non-toxic, natural ingredients formulated to neutralize the protein found in dust mite feces. This brings immediate and positive benefit to people with asthma, rhinitis, eczema or other related conditions. The dust mite treatments makes a big difference on carpets, furniture, mattresses. The products used are all natural, hypo-allergenic, no soaps, no detergents, non toxic carpet cleaning. They come from renewable fruit and vegetable seeds.
 
Cycle Of Dust Mite: The house mite lives for approximately 4 months producing about 200 times its own body weight in excrement and laying approximately 300 eggs, making the concentration of allergens in areas you most frequent. These then in turn are the areas which require the most attention with Allergy Relief Treatment. 
 
Money Back Guarantee: When the Allergy Relief Cleaning and Treatment is used to service the mattress and carpeting in the bedroom of allergy sufferers, it is guaranteed to provide a noticeable improvement in allergy symptoms within 3 days, or your money for the dust mite treatment will be refunded. For allergy relief carpet cleaning, go to Platinum, Gold Cleaning Packages.  For regular green steam cleaning, please read what is covered in the No Frills or Economy Packages. 
 
Get your carpets, mattresses and furniture cleaned to receive the best deals. 

Areas that we service are Mississauga, Brampton, Oakville, Milton, Burlington.

profile:
Dirt Dragger LTD has been offering Carpet and Rug Cleaning Services for the past 20 years. Owner/Operator performs the work with no sub contracting.
 
We offer residential/commercial carpet cleaning services where we will steam clean, deodorize and disinfect all of your carpets. 
 
Oriental/Area Rug Cleaning: Persian Rugs, Wool, Cotton and synthetic in plant cleaning  oriental/area rugs steam cleaned. On premises  
 
Construction Cleaning: Hardwood Washing
 
Upholstery Cleaning: Natural and synthetic fabrics on sofas, loveseats, dining & kitchen chairs, headboards, patio furniture, etc. Steam cleaned, disinfected and deodorized. 
 
Pet Stain / Heavy Stain Removal: A large variety of stain lifters, degreasers and concentrated solutions are available to treat pet stains, high traffic areas, food & beverage stains, etc. 
 
100 % Customer Satisfaction. If you are not satisfied with our cleaning results after the first 15 minutes we will stop and not continue at your request.
 
We provide a complete line of specialty cleaning and restoration services to the residential and commercial markets in Toronto, Mississauga, Brampton, Milton, Burlington, Hamilton, Maple, Richmond Hill, Markham, Scarborough, Pickering, Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa, and surrounding areas.

profile:
Welcome to From Dark To Light Carpet & Upholstery Care. 

We are two friends reunited in Canada, and we decided to start our own cleaning business. 
Our service is combination of Eco-friendly products, knowledgeable and experience technicians, most updated equipment, strict procedures and love for what we do. 

Cleaning procedures are: vacuuming, pre spraying, agitation, hot water extraction and buffing. Disinfection and scotch guard protection are always an option. 
Don’t let your carpet or upholstery to be a breeding ground for germs and bacteria or allergens. Clean carpets and upholstery make your environment healthier.  

When it comes to pet enzyme decontamination we are experts. We can solve even the most severe pet urine accidents.  

We take a pride in the work we do, and we guarantee you'll love the results of our carpet and upholstery cleaning service!

Our Business Hours: 8:00 am until 9:00 pm, 7 days a week 

Available for Emergency stains and carpet cleaning as well.

*** Covid 19 Update: We will be wearing PPE and practicing social distancing while attending the appointments ***

profile:
Professional Carpet Cleaning Company based in Toronto, Ontario that services all corners of the GTA (Greater Toronto Area).

Carpets (flooring) are the most travelled places indoors. It’s the only place you and your guests cannot avoid. That being said, there’s a list of things to do to maintain them. It is not enough to simply vacuum. Vacuuming does not remove the harmful bacteria’s that are embedded into your carpets fabric. In addition to this, most carpet manufacturers outline specific time frames for carpet maintenance and agree that professional cleaning is hands-down necessary. 

Where the true benefit of carpet cleaning lies is in the overall health it provides to the space the carpets are in. Without a doubt, regular carpet cleaning removes allergens, dust and dirt which improves the air quality, aroma and livability of its surroundings.

* SEE IT FOR YOURSELF !!!

* Who we are?

We are a professional cleaning company with high equipped tools that make your house and office look like new again.

* We Offer
- Carpet Cleaning Shampoo and Steam
- Odour and Stain removal of all kinds
- Fast Drying method
- Upholstery Deep cleaning
- Mattress Deep cleaning
- Tile & Grout cleaning

Why is Carpet Cleaning so important?

It helps to remove dust mites, bacteria and other allergens, which ultimately helps your family breathe easier and reduces the risk of colds and other health problems!

Why is Tile and Grout Cleaning important?

Because without regular professional cleaning, the grout in between tiles will start to look black and dirty. Not only does this look bad, but it can also harbor bacteria that could give off offensive odors or even make you sick.
